p: Finally, regarding the composition in total polysaccharides between the two species (Fig. 1 (c)), the extraction with 50% (v/v) methanol presented a significantly higher yield than the other two extractions ( p < 0.001). For example, A. vera contains 7.72 ng/g against 0.25 ng/g for 100 mM Tris-HCl buffer and 0.14 ng/g for 100% (v/v) methanol.
